quotes.quote: The universe is not outside. It is inside ourselves.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet all is accomplished.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The universe is change; our own selves must adapt.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet all things come to being.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: A journey without knowing where you are going is like painting your masterpiece
quotes.author: Wu Wei, Chinese Taoist

quotes.quote: A journey without direction is like floating clouds.
quotes.author: Tao Yuanming

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The journey is more important than arrival.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A journey without destination is wisdom.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet all is accomplished.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Wisdom is not about being intelligent, it is just knowing what to do.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The more you know, the less you understand.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: The universe is not outside, it is inside
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: Wisdom is knowing that which cannot be learned
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: The more you know, the less you understand.
quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

quotes.quote: Virtue is more to man than wealth.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Balance and harmony bring peace.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: In every moment, there is learning to be gained.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Happiness is like a butterfly; the more you chase it, the less you will find.
quotes.author: Sochu (Chinese Proverb)

quotes.quote: Seek wisdom, not wealth; virtue, not fame.
quotes.author: Confucius
